item.title: Code Along - Host Final Project on Github Pages
item.description: Github Pages Free service from Github that allows developers to host websites in the cloud We will be using Github Pages to host your final projects Instructions As a class we will follow the instructions found in the link below to host our Final Projects in the cloud: instructions

item.title: Lab - Final Projects
item.description: Lab Work on your final project At this point you should only be adding finishing touches (fine tuning CSS, fixing indentation, etc) You should avoid adding new features at this point
